2023.title: Initiated the Transition to Software Development
2023.description: In my first week, I watched 10+ hours of crash course tutorials on various languages and frameworks, completely rewrote my resume, joined Udemy and GitHub, created and launched my own personal website...Now let's talk about making a dedicated decision and not turning back.

2023.title: Upgrading my Workstation to Tech-Savvy
2023.description: Violinists only need a music stand and a pencil. A software developer? Very different answer. Got my first monitor, split mechanical keyboard, wireless mouse, and a comfy ergonomic office chair.
